content.description: Start in an awkward "sit" start with your hands on the sideways tooth and your feet on the ledge. Work your way up the obvious crack until you are standing on the ledge. Mantel the top for a clean finish, or lay the smackdown with a dead whale finish.
content.protection: A crashpad is required. A spotter is highly recommended. The vottom has gaps between the rocks that the crash pad can cover if placed correctly; however, the bottom is overall uneven where a spotter would be very useful in the event of a fall.
content.location: From Tide Pool Boulder, head 100 feet along the coast towards Half Moon Beach.

content.description: This area has one obvious line, but the rest could have potential for more advanced problems.
